announcement_items.title: Employee Benefits Enrollment
announcement_items.body_html: Open enrollment for health insurance and retirement benefits is now available. Access your benefits portal to make changes.

announcement_items.title: Holiday Schedule Reminder
announcement_items.body_html: Please review the holiday schedule for winter break. Campus offices will operate on reduced hours.

announcement_items.title: Performance Review Process
announcement_items.body_html: Annual performance reviews are due by January 15th. Contact HR for assistance with the evaluation process.
